starting_location.name: A hotel room
starting_location.ambience: The environment sets the mood for your adventure.

exchanges.speaker: Player
exchanges.text: Please provide a brief introduction to this world and the beginning of my adventure.

exchanges.speaker: DM
exchanges.text:
In Headahce land, mornings are quiet, with sunlight filtering through thin curtains. Damien wakes up in a modest hotel room, the faint hum of the city below seeping through the windows. The air is filled with the scent of stale cigarettes from previous occupants.

The small bedside clock ticks loudly, marking time with relentless precision. A worn-out newspaper lies crumpled on the nightstand, hinting at the mundane events of yesterday.

What will you do?

exchanges.speaker: DM
exchanges.text:
Damien pulls back the thin curtains to reveal a bustling city street. The distant rumble of traffic mixes with the chatter of early risers below, while a nearby pigeon coos softly from its perch on the windowsill. The sun glints off a neon sign across the street.

The window's glass has a faint greasy film.
